new_functions_suggested.description: Automated management and maintenance of configuration baselines across all systems
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced baseline management for CM-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated workflow management for configuration change requests and approvals
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Streamlined change control for CM-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated analysis of configuration change impacts on security and privacy
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced impact analysis for CM-4 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated enforcement of access restrictions for configuration changes
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced access control for CM-5 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Enhanced monitoring and reporting of configuration compliance across all systems
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced compliance monitoring for CM-6 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Enhanced automated inventory management and tracking of system components
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced inventory management for CM-8 compliance
